actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to change the composition and licensing procedures of the District of Columbia Board of Cosmetology, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the composition of the District of Columbia Board of Cosmetology; and the licensing procedures and requirements regarding cosmetologists and beauty shops.

titles.title: A bill to change the composition and licensing procedures of the District of Columbia Board of Cosmetology, and for other purposes.
